name: Bike Race Rivals
description:
The bike race rivals give you an adventurous experience of crazy bike racing where fast speed is the only thing to follow.
Bike racing is not an easy task especially when you are on an extreme challenging way with the top racers. Bury the competition, pull the throttle and push the envelope on the bike, Compete and defeat your rivals as you drive through a variety of treacherous tracks and enjoy 3D fast traffic heat racer game.
Accelerate towards an amazing win the most exhilarating motorcycle racing game. Challenge your opponents to an extreme bike race, defying laws of physics and compete in thrilling chases and races around multiple tracks.
It's the insane wild ride of mobile games! Set up in a beautiful 3D world with realistic motocross physics and handheld controls. The bike race rivals provide you the feeling of super-fast Motorcycle racing.
Smooth controls, wicked opponents, nitro boosts and awesome bikes with daredevil stunts and fast speed.
Features of Racing Rivals
- Race against your ultimate rivals in fantasy city environment.
- Realistic Bike physics
- Smooth Tilt and touch controls. You choose how to shift and steer.
- Breath-taking competitive bike racing levels.
- Beautiful HD City graphics in day, evening and Night modes.
- 3D Racing and hardcore bike racing rivals.
